title: Culture and the Games People Play

media:group.media:title: Culture and the Games People Play
media:group.media:description:
Adopt the right emerging trends to solve your complex engineering challenges at QCon London March 27-29, 2022. 
Get practical inspiration and best practices on how to implement emerging software trends directly from senior software developers at early adopter companies.

Learn the emerging trends. Explore the use cases. Implement the best practices.

Save your spot now: https://bit.ly/3Rvcpda
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Video on InfoQ:  https://bit.ly/3DKldIH   

Roy Rapoport demonstrates the power of alignment (or lack thereof) using real-world examples from previous and current employer, with specific emphasis on his experience introducing Python to production use within Netflix, the organizational structures he interacted with through that process, and the way they tie into Netflix's formal culture.

This presentation was recorded at QCon San Francisco 2015. 

#Culture #Netflix #OrganizationalPatterns
